mapper.select:
SELECT e.* FROM t_oa_employee e
LEFT JOIN t_oa_emp_role er ON er.id=e.id WHERE er.role_id=#{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
WHERE
e.EMPLOYEE_ID like #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
e.EMPLOYEE_NAME like #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
1=1 LIMIT #{off,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{lim,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT count(1) FROM t_oa_employee e
LEFT JOIN t_oa_emp_role er ON er.id=e.id WHERE er.role_id=#{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
WHERE
e.EMPLOYEE_ID like #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
e.EMPLOYEE_NAME like #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
1=1 LIMIT #{off,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{lim,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT e.* FROM t_oa_emp_role er LEFT JOIN t_oa_employee e ON er.id=e.id WHERE er.role_id=#{role_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: ID, EMPLOYEE_ID, NICK, EMPLOYEE_NAME, DEPART_ID, NOW_PASSWORD, SELL_CODE, OLD_PASSWORD, THAN_OLD_PASSWORD, UPDATE_PASSWORD_DATE, BIRTHDAY, SEX, IDCARD_NUMBER, EDUCATION, FOREIGN_COUNTRIE, GRADUATE_SCHOOL, PHONE_NUMBER, IP, COUNTRIE, PROVINCE_AND_CITY, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, EMAIL, QQ, STATUS, PAGE_COUNT_SIZE, GROUP_PAGE_SIZE, SHOW_STYLE, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, LOGIN_COUNT, SELECTED_FLAG, REMARK, LOGIN_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from t_oa_employee
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from t_oa_employee
order by ${orderByClause}

update t_oa_employee
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEE_ID = #{record.employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NICK = #{record.nick,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMPLOYEE_NAME = #{record.employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPART_ID = #{record.departId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

GRADUATE_SCHOOL = #{record.graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE_NUMBER = #{record.phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{record.ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTRIE = #{record.countrie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROVINCE_AND_CITY = #{record.provinceAndCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZIP_CODE = #{record.zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
